key_changes: Introduced optional Redis URL for distributed rate limiting
file_insights.configuration_strategy: Pydantic BaseSettings with environment variable support

patterns_discovered: Rate limiting configuration as string values
gotchas_discovered: Potential runtime parsing required for rate limit strings
Redis URL is optional, which might require null checks
Default rate limits might not suit all use cases
recommendations: Add validation for rate limit configuration strings
Consider adding more granular rate limit controls
Validate Redis connection if distributed rate limiting is used
